statements: UPSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, quantity) VALUES ('1111-1111', 'Carrot', 'Vegetable', 100)
UPSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, quantity) VALUES ('2222-2222', 'Tomato', 'Fruit', 150)
UPSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, quantity) VALUES ('3333-3333', 'Corn', 'Vegetable', 200)
UPSERT INTO crops (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type) VALUES (1, 'Tomato', 'Vegetable')
UPSERT INTO farms (farm_id, farm_name, location) VALUES (1, 'Sunshine Farm', 'California')
UPSERT INTO crops (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type) VALUES (2, 'Apple', 'Fruit')
INSERT INTO farmers (id, name, age, location) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 35, 'California') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='John Doe', age=35, location='California'
INSERT INTO crops (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type, farmer_id) VALUES (1, 'Corn', 'Grain', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE crop_name='Corn', crop_type='Grain', farmer_id=1
INSERT INTO fields (field_id, field_name, field_size, crop_id) VALUES (1, 'Field A', 10.5, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE field_name='Field A', field_size=10.5, crop_id=1

UPSERT INTO farm (id, name, location, established_date) VALUES (1, 'Farm A', 'Location A', '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Farm A', location = 'Location A', established_date = '2022-01-01'

UPSERT INTO crop (id, name, type, growing_season, yield_per_acre) VALUES (1, 'Crop A', 'Type A', 'Season A', 50.5) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Crop A', type = 'Type A', growing_season = 'Season A', yield_per_acre = 50.5

UPSERT INTO farmer (id, name, age, gender, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'Farmer A', 30, 'Male', '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Farmer A', age = 30, gender = 'Male', phone_number = '123-456-7890'
